Articles.Content:
Day 1: Heading into surgery. I waited an hour on a bed then moved to the hallway,waited a bit, was wheeled into some room,had a needle (ded). Woke up. No pain. Now to head home.

Day 2: Starting to hurt.

(fast forward to Day 6)

Day 6: Woke up, doing fine,able to eat normal meals. Then my mouth begins bleeding. Right now gauze is in my mouth. Looks like no school tomorrow.

P2: Seems like it stopped or atleast slowed.

Edited October 16, 2014 by GamerMelon
EBOLA!!! XD on a more serious note tho, are you ok? I mean, your mouth bleeding. :I
What is up with this ebola thing? Seriously,be nice. Im ok. It seems to be stopping now.

It's good

Hope something won't happen again..
What's the purpose of this thread? What surgery? Complicated wisdom tooth extraction?
